jdxi_editor.midi.data.parameter.digital.helpers.digital

.. py:module:: jdxi_editor.midi.data.parameter.digital.helpers.digital

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

Functions

.. autoapisummary::

   jdxi_editor.midi.data.parameter.digital.helpers.digital.parse_digital_parameters


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: parse_digital_parameters(data: list) -> dict

   Parses JD-Xi tone parameters from SysEx data, including Oscillator, Filter, and Amplitude parameters.

   :param data: bytes SysEx message containing tone parameters.
   :return: dict Parsed parameters.
